name: Figma Keyboard Shortcuts (International)
description:
Windows users with a non-QWERTY keyboard know the pain trying to learn Figma shortcuts - they're mapped to different keys.


Live version -> ui-kit.co/shortcuts


Use these Cheat Sheets to learn your localized keyboard shortcuts. Available in German, Spanish, French, Czech, Portuguese (BR/PT), Russian, Arabic, Swedish, Dutch.


Feel free to Print & Download as PDF.


Request your language -> info@ui-kit.co
